pageContext.collection_title: Music for the connoisseur [sound recording] : The Randolph Singers and the solo song.
pageContext.collection_description: In 1st-5th works: Hugues Cu√©nod, tenor ; Hermann Leeb, lute. In 6th work (aka 5th work, version 2): Paul Matthen, bass ; Emilia Mitrani, piano.
